titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of methyl 4-iodo-2-Y3-(4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5- triazin-2-yl)ureidosulfonyl? benzoate, sodium salt(Iodosulfuron methyl, sodium salt) and application adjuvants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/16/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of methyl 4-iodo-2-Y3-(4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5- triazin-2-yl)ureidosulfonyl? benzoate, sodium salt(Iodosulfuron methyl, sodium salt) and application adjuvants.
